source.daa11d89:
win_rate_role = data.groupby('Role')[['Win %','Role %', 'Pick %', 'Ban %']].mean().reset_index()
for i in ['Win %','Role %', 'Pick %', 'Ban %']:
    sns.barplot(x='Role', y=i, data= win_rate_role,palette = "Reds")
    plt.xlabel('')
    plt.title(f'{i} of each role in LOL')
    plt.show()

graph = sns.regplot(x='KDA',y='Win %', data=data)
graph.axhline(50, color='red',ls='--')
plt.title('KDA and Win rate')
plt.show()

source.fe83c388:
plt.figure(figsize=(14,6))
mask = np.triu(np.ones_like(data.corr(), dtype=bool))
sns.set(font_scale=1.5)
plt.rc('font', family='Times New Roman', size=12)
sns.heatmap(data.corr(), mask =mask, vmin=-1, vmax=1, annot=True, cmap='OrRd')
plt.title('Correlation Heatmap')
plt.show()
source.e9e536e9:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 10))
sns.heatmap(data.corr()[['Win %']].sort_values(by='Win %', ascending=False), vmin=-1, vmax=1, annot=True, cmap='OrRd')
plt.title('Features correlated with Win Rate', pad =16)
plt.show()
source.10726165:
## Conclusion
There are few conclusions :
1. ADC seems to have highest popularity among all the roles in legend of leagues. Top 5 most picked ADCs are Jhin, Jinx, Caitlyn, Ezreal and Kai'Sa.
2. MID Champions have highest ban rate and lowest pick rate.
2. KDA(Kills Deaths Assists),Trend and Score of a Champ have strong correlation with win rate. 
3. Ban rate, Pick rate and Role rate only have little correlation with win rate.

In summary, to have a high win rate in legend of leagues Trend and Score of a champion is important, some champion simply are more powerful than others.
source.c18e3c29: ### Let's take a closer look at ADCs, who is the most popular ADC?
source.8bec9dd0: #### As expected, we can see KDA can increase Win rate.
source.bdf9d34d:
### KDA stands for "Kills Deaths Assists" 
### (Kills + Assists) / Deaths = KDA
#### It is reasonable that the more kills and assists you have, the easier you will win the game.
#### so this number should have a strong relationship with Win rate.
